description: Manipulate the age of creatures you encounter.
name: Age Manipulation

talents.info_text:
Projects a bolt of temporal energy that deals 106, 145, 175, 200, 222 temporal damage, and reduces all of the target's stats by 10, 12, 14, 16, 17 for 3 turns.

At talent level 4 you may project a second bolt.

The damage dealt will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Turn Back the Clock

talents.info_text:
Reverts the minds of all creatures in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone to an infantile state, in effect confusing them (10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50% to act randomly) for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Temporal Fugue

talents.info_text:
You surround yourself with a radius 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 distortion of time, which deals 95, 130, 156, 179, 199 stacking temporal damage over 3 turns to all other creatures. The effect lasts 7, 8, 10, 11, 13 turns.

The damage dealt will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Ashes to Ashes

talents.info_text:
You revert your body to a previous state, healing yourself for 326, 443, 534, 611, 680 life and removing 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 physical status effects (both good and bad).

The amount of life healed will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Body Reversion

description: Spacetime anomalies that can randomly occur when paradox is to high.
name: anomalies

talents.info_text: Randomly teleports 3 targets within range of the caster 29 tiles away.
talents.name: Anomaly Teleport

talents.info_text: Randomly teleports 12 targets within range of the caster 5 tiles away.
talents.message: @Source@ has caused a hiccup in the fabric of spacetime.
talents.name: Anomaly Rearrange

talents.info_text: Stuns all targets in radius 3 ball for 6 turns.
talents.message: @Source@ has created a bubble of nul time.
talents.name: Anomaly Stop

talents.info_text: Slows all targets in a radius 3 ball by 16%.
talents.message: @Source@ has created a bubble of slow time.
talents.name: Anomaly Slow

talents.info_text: Increases global speed of up to 2 targets in a radius 10 ball centered on target by 39%.
talents.message: @Source@ has sped up several threads of time.
talents.name: Anomaly Haste

talents.info_text: Creates a temporal storm for 12 turns that deals 23 temporal damage each turn.
talents.name: Anomaly Temporal Storm

talents.info_text: Summons 3 time elementals for 12 turns that may or may not be friendly to the caster.
talents.message: Some Time Elementals have been attracted by @Source@'s meddling.
talents.name: Anomaly Summon Time Elemental

talents.info_text: Places 3 random targets in time prisons for 5 turns.
talents.name: Anomaly Temporal Bubble

talents.info_text: Digs out all terrain in a ball centered on the caster..
talents.name: Anomaly Dig

talents.info_text: Caster swaps places with a random target within range 30, confusing (18% chance to act randomly) both of them for 2 turns.
talents.name: Anomaly Swap

talents.info_text: Creates a Gravity Spike.
talents.name: Anomaly Gravity Spike

talents.info_text: Places 2 talents of up to 6 targets in a radius 10 ball on cooldown for up to 5 turns.
talents.name: Anomaly Entropy

talents.info_text: Pulls innocent people into the fight.
talents.message: Some innocent bystanders have been pulled out of their timeline.
talents.name: Anomaly Summon Townsfolk

talents.info_text: Pulls up to 3 enemies within range 20 to the caster's location.
talents.name: Anomaly Call

talents.info_text: Weakens several creatures within range 10.
talents.name: Anomaly Flawed Design

talents.info_text: Substantially toughens and hastes one target for 8 turns.
talents.name: Anomaly Dues Ex

description: Allows you to glimpse the future, or become more aware of the present.
name: chronomancy

talents.info_text:
You peer into the future, allowing you to explore your surroundings for 7, 10, 13, 15, 17 turns. When Precognition expires, you'll return to the point in time you first cast the spell. Dying with precognition active will end the spell prematurely.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

Splitting the timeline is difficult, you will only be protected after the current turn ends.
talents.name: Precognition

talents.info_text: When the duration of your Precognition expires, you'll be given a vision of your surroundings, sensing terrain, enemies, objects, and traps in a 6, 9, 12, 14, 16 radius.
talents.name: Foresight

talents.info_text:
You pull your awareness fully into the moment, increasing your stealth detection, see invisibility, defense, and accuracy by 6, 10, 13, 16, 19 for 4, 8, 10, 11, 12 turns.

If you have Spin Fate active when you cast this spell, you'll gain a bonus to these values equal to 50% of your spin.

This spell takes no time to cast.
talents.name: Moment of Prescience

talents.info_text:
You've learned to make minor corrections in how future events unfold. Each time you make a saving throw, all your saves are increased by 1, 3, 4, 5, 7 (stacking up to a maximum increase of 8, 15, 22, 29, 35 for each value).

The effect will last 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns, but the duration will refresh everytime it's reapplied.
talents.name: Spin Fate

description: Manipulate raw energy by addition or subtraction.
name: energy

talents.info_text:
Partially dissipates all incoming energy damage (all except mind and physical damage), reducing it by 30%, up to a maximum of 106, 144, 174, 199, 221.

The maximum damage reduction will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Energy Decomposition

talents.info_text:
You encase yourself in a field that slows incoming projectiles by 43%, 56%, 65%, 73%, 80%, and increases your physical resistance by 21%, 28%, 32%, 36%, 40%.

The effect will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Entropic Field

talents.info_text:
You sap the target's energy and add it to your own, placing up to 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 random talents on cooldown for 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns. For each talent put on cooldown, you reduce the cooldown of one of your chronomancy talents currently on cooldown by 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.

The number of talents affected scales with your Paradox.
talents.name: Energy Absorption

talents.info_text:
You may recast the next activated chronomancy spell (up to talent level 1.5, 3.0, 4.5, 6.0, 7.5) that you cast within the next 5 turns on the turn following its initial casting.

The Paradox cost of the initial spell will be paid each time it is cast, and the second casting will still consume a turn.

This spell takes no time to cast.
talents.name: Redux

description: Call upon the force of gravity to crush, push, and pull your foes.
name: gravity

talents.info_text:
Sends out a blast wave of gravity in a 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 radius cone, dealing 121, 165, 199, 227, 253 physical damage and knocking back creatures caught in the area. This deals 50% extra damage to pinned targets, in addition to the knockback.

The blast wave may hit targets more then once, depending on the radius and the knockback effect.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Repulsion Blast

talents.info_text:
Creates a gravity spike in a radius of 2, 3, 3, 3, 4 that moves all targets towards the spells center and inflicts 121, 165, 199, 227, 253 physical damage. This deals 50% extra damage to pinned targets, in addition to the knockback.

The damage dealt will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Gravity Spike

talents.info_text:
You surround yourself with a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 distortion of gravity, knocking back and dealing 55, 75, 91, 104, 115 physical damage to all creatures inside it. The effect lasts 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns. Deals 50% extra damage to pinned targets, in addition to the knockback.

The blast wave may hit targets more then once, depending on the radius and the knockback effect.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Repulsion Field

talents.info_text:
Increases local gravity of an area, doing 55, 75, 91, 104, 115 physical damage with a chance to pin in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 each turn for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage done will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Gravity Well

talents.info_text:
Fires a beam that turns matter into dust, inflicting 83, 113, 136, 156, 173 temporal damage and 83, 113, 136, 156, 173 physical damage.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Dust to Dust

talents.info_text:
Fragile spikes of carbon protrude from your flesh, clothing, and armor, increasing your armor rating by 34, 47, 56, 64, 71 and inflicting 70, 95, 114, 131, 146 bleed damage over six turns on attackers. Each time you're struck, the armor increase will be reduced by 1. Each turn the spell will regenerate 1 armor up to its starting value.

If the armor increase from the spell ever falls below 1, the sustain will deactivate and the effect will end.

The armor and bleed damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Carbon Spikes

talents.info_text:
Destabilizes the target, inflicting 41, 56, 67, 77, 86 temporal damage per turn for 10 turns. If the target dies while destabilized, it will explode, doing 83, 113, 136, 156, 173 temporal damage and 83, 113, 136, 156, 173 physical damage in a radius of 4.

If the target dies while also under the effects of continuum destabilization, all explosion damage will be done as temporal damage.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Destabilize

talents.info_text:
Attempts to pull the target apart at a molecular level, inflicting 109, 149, 179, 205, 228 temporal damage and 109, 149, 179, 205, 228 physical damage. If the target ends up with low enough life (<20%), it might be instantly killed.

Quantum Spike deals 50% additional damage to targets affected by temporal destabilization and/or continuum destabilization.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Quantum Spike

talents.info_text:
Reduces your paradox by one each turn while sustained. Casting a spell will cancel this sustain.

Current failure chance : 3%, 2%, 2%, 2%, 0%

Current anomaly chance : 0%

Current backfire chance : 0%
talents.name: Spacetime Tuning

description: Create loopholes in the laws of spacetime.
name: paradox

talents.info_text: You've learned to focus your control over the spacetime continuum, and quell anomalous effects. Increases your Temporal resistance by 14%, 24%, 32%, 39%, 45%, extends the duration of the Static History stability effect by 0, 1, 2, 2, 3 turns, and increases your effective willpower for failure, anomaly, and backfire calculations by 21%, 35%, 46%, 56%, 64%.
talents.name: Paradox Mastery

talents.info_text:
Over the next 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns, you attempt to remove the target from the timeline. Its resistances will be reduced by 33%, 40%, 45%, 48%, 51%, and if you manage to kill it while the spell is in effect, you'll be returned to the point in time you cast this spell and the target will be slain.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

The duration will scale with your Paradox and the resistance penalty will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Cease to Exist

talents.info_text:
You partially remove yourself from the timeline for 10 turns.

This increases your resistance to all damage by 33%, 46%, 55%, 63%, 70%, reduces the duration of all detrimental effects on you by 33%, 40%, 45%, 48%, 51%, and reduces all damage you deal by 20%.

The resistance bonus, effect reduction, and damage penalty will gradually lose power over the duration of the spell.

The effects scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Fade From Time

talents.info_text:
You summon your future self to fight alongside you for 4, 6, 7, 8, 10 turns. At some point in the future, you'll be pulled into the past to fight alongside your past self after the initial effect ends.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Paradox Clone

description: Mastery of folding points in space.
name: Spacetime Folding

talents.info_text:
Folds a single dimension of your weapons (or ammo) upon itself, adding 17, 22, 27, 31, 34 temporal damage to your strikes (33, 45, 54, 62, 69 for ammo) and reducing your Paradox by 0.9, 1.6, 2.3, 2.9, 3.5 every time you land an attack (1.8, 3.3, 4.6, 5.8, 6.9 for ammo).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Weapon Folding

talents.info_text:
You manipulate the spacetime continuum in such a way that you switch places with another creature with in a range of 3, 5, 6, 7, 8. The targeted creature will be confused (power 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%) for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The spell's hit chance will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Swap

talents.info_text: Space bends around you, giving you a 14%, 23%, 28%, 32%, 34% chance to displace half of any damage you receive onto a random enemy within a radius of 3, 6, 9, 11, 13.
talents.name: Displace Damage

talents.info_text:
Violently fold the space between yourself and another point within range. You move to the target location, and leave a temporal wake behind that stuns for 4 turns and inflicts 166, 226, 272, 311, 346 temporal damage to everything in the path.

The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower, and the range will increase with the talent level.
talents.name: Temporal Wake

description: Weave the threads of spacetime and correct the damage you've caused through your meddling.
name: Spacetime Weaving

talents.info_text:
Teleports you to up to 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 tiles away, to a targeted location in line of sight. Additional talent points increase the range.

This spell takes no time to cast.
talents.name: Dimensional Step

talents.info_text:
Randomly teleports all targets within a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 around you. Targets will be teleported between 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 and 9, 12, 15, 17, 19 tiles from their current location.

The teleport range will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Banish

talents.info_text:
You fold the space between yourself and a random point within range, creating a pair of wormholes. Any creature stepping on either wormhole will be teleported to the other. The wormholes will last 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns.

At level 4, you may choose the exit location target area (radius 6, 4, 3, 2, 2). The duration will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Wormhole

talents.info_text: Your mastery of spacetime reduces the cooldown of Banish, Dimensional Step, Swap, and Temporal Wake by 2, 3, 4, 5, 5, and the cooldown of Wormhole by 4, 7, 9, 10, 11. Also improves your Spellpower for purposes of hitting targets with chronomancy effects that may cause continuum destabilization (Banish, Time Skip, etc.), as well as your chance of overcoming continuum destabilization, by 21%, 37%, 47%, 54%, 60%.
talents.name: Spacetime Mastery

description: Control how fast objects and creatures move through spacetime.
name: Speed Control

talents.info_text: Increases your movement speed by 20%, 34%, 46%, 57%, 67%, and switching between already equipped weapon sets (default hotkey q) no longer takes a turn.
talents.name: Celerity

talents.info_text:
Inflicts 121, 165, 199, 227, 253 temporal damage, and attempts to stun all creatures in a radius 1, 2, 2, 2, 3 ball for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns.

The stun duration will scale with your Paradox, and the damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Stop

talents.info_text:
Creates a time distortion in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 that lasts for 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns, decreasing global speed by 43%, 56%, 60%, 60%, 60% for 3 turns and inflicting 41, 56, 67, 77, 86 temporal damage each turn to all targets within the area.

The slow effect and damage dealt will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Slow

talents.info_text:
Increases your global speed by 55%, 70%, 80%, 89%, 96% for the next 4 game turns. Each time you move with this effect active, you'll leave behind an image of yourself for two turns that may draw enemy attacks.

The speed increase will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Haste

description: A blend of chronomancy and physical combat.
name: Temporal Combat

talents.info_text:
You've learned to boost your strength through your control of the spacetime continuum. Increases your Strength and your Physical Save by 12, 18, 22, 26, 29.

The effect will scale with your Willpower.
talents.name: Strength of Purpose

talents.info_text:
For the next 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns, you recover 2.1, 3.6, 4.7, 5.6, 6.4 stamina each turn and all other talents on cooldown will refresh twice as fast as usual.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Invigorate

talents.info_text:
You've learned to boost your magic through your control over the spacetime continuum. Increases your Magic and your Spell Save by 11, 17, 21, 25, 28.

The effect will scale with your Willpower.
talents.name: Quantum Feed

talents.info_text:
For the next 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns, you convert all non-temporal damage you receive into temporal damage spread out over six turns.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Damage Smearing

description: Travel through time yourself, or send your foes into the future.
name: Time Travel

talents.info_text:
By slightly reorganizing history, you reduce your Paradox by 143, 195, 235, 269, 299 and temporarily stabilize the timeline; this allows chronomancy to be used without chance of failure for 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns (backfires and anomalies may still occur).

The paradox reduction will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Static History

talents.info_text:
Inflicts 181, 246, 297, 340, 378 temporal damage, if the target fails a spell save. If your target survives, it will be removed from time for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns.

The duration will scale with your Paradox. The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Time Skip

talents.info_text:
Creates a temporal echo in a nova around you, in a radius of 2, 4, 5, 6, 7. Affected targets will take 114, 155, 187, 214, 237 temporal damage, as well as 16%, 18%, 19%, 20%, 21% of the difference between their current life and max life as additional temporal damage.

The percentage and damage scales with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Echoes From The Past

talents.info_text:
Manipulate the flow of time, reducing the cooldown of all your talents on cooldown by 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns, and reducing the duration of most status effects currently affecting you (good or bad) by 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The effect will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Temporal Reprieve

description: Examine and alter the timelines that make up the spacetime continuum.
name: Timeline Threading

talents.info_text:
You begin to gather energy from other timelines. Your Spellpower will increase by 13, 23, 33, 42, 50 on the first turn and 2.10, 3.91, 5.50, 6.96, 8.33 more each additional turn.

The effect ends either when you cast a spell, or after five turns.

Eacn turn the effect is active, your Paradox will be reduced by 5, 9, 13, 17, 20.

This spell will not break Spacetime Tuning, nor will it be broken by activating Spacetime Tuning.
talents.name: Gather the Threads

talents.info_text:
Creates a wake of temporal energy that deals 144, 195, 235, 269, 299 damage in a beam, as you attempt to rethread the timeline. Affected targets may be stunned, blinded, pinned, or confused for 3 turns.

Each target you hit with Rethread will reduce your Paradox by 1.8, 3.3, 4.6, 5.8, 6.9.

The damage will increase with your Paradox and Spellpower.
talents.name: Rethread

talents.info_text:
Pulls a medium, medium, big, big, huge size or smaller copy of the target from another timeline; the copy stays for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns. The copy and the target will be compelled to attack each other immediately.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.
talents.name: Temporal Clone

talents.info_text:
You peer into three possible futures, allowing you to explore each for 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns. When the effect expires, you'll choose which of the three futures becomes your present. Note that seeing visions of your own death can still be fatal.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

This spell takes no time to cast.
talents.name: See the Threads
